name: Hop Together
description:
Help the bunnies bring their carrots to the surface in this short puzzle game! How to play
  • Use the arrow keys to move the bunnies 
  • Move the carrot to the top layer
  • Don't let any bunnies get stuck in the water!

---

Created by Matthew Ostil (@matthewostil) and rurupoi (@rurupoi) for TOJam 2020.
